plot: A group of actors in a theater workshop, The American Crucible of Theater, rehearse a short play based upon Edgar Allen Poe's "The Tell Tale Heart".
title: The Tell Tale Cell: A Rehearsal
plot_es: A group of actors in a theater workshop, The American Crucible of Theater, rehearse a short play based upon Edgar Allen Poe's "The Tell Tale Heart".
original_name: The Tell Tale Cell: A Rehearsal
plot_en: A group of actors in a theater workshop, The American Crucible of Theater, rehearse a short play based upon Edgar Allen Poe's "The Tell Tale Heart".
